page.title: 20END_OF_TERM ACTIVITIES
page.content: The last few days days of the academic year are occupied with different activities from normal. The major event is Sports Day when nearly all the pupils compete in the various events_:50,75,100,200,400,800,1500 metres,Shot,Discus,Javelin,Long Jump,High Jump and Triple Jump. Most children do up to three or four events. This is held in school time and many parents come to spectate. Many of the pupils also compete in inter_house Cricket and Rounders during the last week of term. The sporting activities are completed with the Staff playing the children at Tennis, Cricket and Rounders. The school leavers attend a discotheque and barbecue on the last evening and the term is finished with an assembly where we say farewell to those leaving....by Derek Brooks.
